title: Timesurfers
description: "You’ve misunderstood. It’s not a choice. It’s a destiny."When fifteen year old Cate accidentally brings a dead cheerleader back to life her connection to the secretive Timesurfers is revealed. The Timesurfers travel through time and battle the powerful dark forces intent on manipulating history. Cate must discover her powers, choose a side and end a centuries old war. No pressure.
author: Rhonda Sermon
